tool_description: Identifies and analyzes correlations between different soil parameters, develops predictive relationships, and validates existing correlations against the dataset.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs to analyze for correlations

secondary_parameters.description: Secondary parameters to correlate with primary parameters

correlation_type.description: Correlation method: pearson, spearman, or kendall

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more sample IDs do not exist or lack required data.
Insufficient parameters: Need at least 2 parameters for correlation analysis.
Unsupported correlation type: Use one of [pearson, spearman, kendall].
Insufficient data points: Need at least 15 samples for reliable correlation analysis.
usage: Provide sample_ids, primary_parameters, and secondary_parameters to analyze correlations. Optionally specify correlation_type for different statistical approaches.

correlation_coefficients.description: Correlation coefficient values between parameter pairs

regression_equations.description: Best-fit regression equations for strong correlations
